referenceObject.reference: Wilson, J. D. & Rix, M. G. (2021). Systematics of the Australian golden trapdoor spiders of the Euoplos variabilis-group (Mygalomorphae: Idiopidae: Euoplini): parapatry and sympatry between closely related species in subtropical Queensland. Invertebrate Systematics 35(5): 514-541.
